description:
A coalition of major news publishers has filed a lawsuit against Microsoft and OpenAI, accusing the tech giants of unlawfully using copyrighted articles to train their generative AI models without permission or payment. First reported by The Verge, the group of eight publications owned by Alden Global Capital (AGC) – including the Chicago Tribune, New... Read more »

The post Coalition of news publishers sue Microsoft and OpenAI appeared first on AI News.
title: Coalition of news publishers sue Microsoft and OpenAI
